name: Legionarus's Furyous Quest
description:
Project done for MetroidVania Month XVI.

The theme was shapeshifting. This is a little prototype done in one month by a small team of 6. Should work with both mouse+keyboard and gamepad.

Programming Team : 

  • Jercky
  • Ptilulu
  • SupT
  • Taehupo

Art Team : 

  • Herk Lapaduza
  • Salem Drenay
